phrases: If you keep adding all that extra stuff, you will never get it right.
Jasminka, cannot you take this more seriously?
Besides, anything you touch is guaranteed to fail.
I am saying a dunce like you has no right to give anyone a talking to.
I am saying it is pointless for a dunce to get so worked up.
You are the dunce, Amanda!
I just gave you a little attitude adjustment.
I just kindly adjusted your attitude a little.
I was just kindly adjusting your posture.
As if you can lecture anyone on their attitude!
You are not got the right to lecture people on their posture.
You have just got a grudge because you lost the race!
Huh?!
No, I am not!
Huh?!
I do not!
You dunce have nothing I could even be jealous of!
There is nothing to be jealous of a dunce like you!
I told you that you are the dunce here!
You are the dunce here!
The biggest dunce here...
Jeralitore!
It sounds like you are looking for some punishment.
A punishment that will dry the blood from your veins!
Why not use your time sitting in the corner to settle this?
The matter of which of you is the biggest dunce in school.
The matter of who of you the biggest dunce in school is, that is.
Which of you is the biggest dunce in school.
I do not give a damn what family she is from.
That snobby attitude just pisses me off!
A whole herd of dragons came and flew away with it!
Let us go get back the Sorcerer's Stone right away!
We will lend you our help too!
Atsuko Kagari, I am appointing you to hand wash all of the academy's laundry.
Without the Sorcerer's Stone, none of the fairies can move.
Anyway, why are Lotte and me even helping you with your punishment?
Geez!
We do not have time to waste doing all this!
Take it down a notch with your pedaling.
You are splashing water all the way over here.
So, what are you saying we can do against the dragons?
What are you saying we can do against dragons?
If they are from around here, I wonder if the one from the Rastaban Ruins is among them.
If that dragon is from around here, then maybe it lives in the Rastaban Ruins?
Lotte, you know which one?
It had a reputation as being one of the more brutal dragons back in the day.
But almost nobody's seen it in the last hundred years or so.
Curse you for rising from your hundred year break!
And there she goes with another one of her crazy ideas.
The only thing you should concern yourself with is the laundry.
The only thing you should be doing right now is laundry.
We are not even close to being done with the laundry, though.
This effects you too, Diana!
Without the Sorcerer's Stone, we will not be able to have any more classes!
People like you, who cannot even keep up in class, would certainly only compound the problem if they were to interfere.
If people like you who cannot even keep up in class were to step in, the problem would only be compounded.
Moreover, you act far too much without proper thought.
Would it not benefit us all for you to be more aware of your habit of bothering everyone you involve?
If you continue doing this, then one day even your friends will grow unable to put up with you.
Hey, what is that to you?
Leave her alone!
You may have no ambitions, but please do not inconvenience your fellow witches.
Having no goals does not give you the right to inconvenience those around you.
Yes.
Due to the fairies current inability to perform their cleaning, laundry, and cooking duties,
We have got incoming!
Are we under the ruins?
You will get a stomach ache!
I apologize for this late visit.
A-Absolutely not, Fafnir the Great!
Do not think you can wriggle out of this!
Luna Nova has an enormous amount of debt, and they owe it to yours truly.
Luna Nova has an enormous amount of debt, and my name's on the bill!
But I have not received a single payment of it in the last year.
Not even a cent!
W-We never thought you would make good on your promise...
Fafnir the Great, we beg your understanding.
You have only yourselves to blame for pushing magic as it falls out of favor.
I am making immense profits from my online investments.
You do not really need the money right now.
Do not be a stickler!
I still have things I need to achieve!
I will not let you shut down Luna Nova!
I have an ambition.
I will not let you shut down Luna Nova!
Promissory note?
You were to have them pay nonexistent interest!
A baseless accusation.
There is no such thing as a non-interest loan these days.
the amount of capital Luna Nova has paid off as interest has far exceeded the initial investment.
Regarding the refunding of the overpayments, we will file the proper documentation at a later date.
In the light of these arguments, we request the immediate return of our Sorcerer's Stone, Mister Fafnir.
Considering the stated reasons, we request the immediate return of our Sorcerer's Stone, Mister Fafnir.
It is been quite some time since I have last heard someone spout a line this naive.
I have not heard someone spout naive line like that in quite some time.
What really sucks is that Diana totally stole the show.
The biggest dunce here is you, Amanda!
It is you, Akko!
Here where our long journey has finally led us
Here where our long journey has finally led us

kawaranai mama jikan to hikari mitsumete aruiteku
Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
Sugar,
spice,
and everything nice!
That would be... pickled plums!
Let us mix!
Another batch of ingredients wasted.
It only gets messed up because of all the extra stuff you put in.
I figured I might as well make it taste good.
Wait up, Constanze.
That is not witch-like at all.
This coming from you?
Want one?
They are light and fluffy.
You too, Jasminka.
Cannot you take this more seriously?
Who cares as long as it gets done?
Besides, anything you touch is guaranteed to fail.
What is that supposed to mean?!
I am saying it is pointless for a dunce to act so gung-ho.
You cannot even ride a broom.
You are the dunce here, Amanda!
Oh, stuff it.
Quit yapping into my ear.
What was that?!
What are you doing?!
I just gave you a little lesson in manners.
As if you even know the first thing about manners!
Well, you are just sore about losing the race!
Huh?!
I am not!
Your eyes are green with envy.
Who could possibly be jealous of a dunce like you?
I said you are the dunce here!
The biggest dunce...
Is you!
It is you!
It is definitely you!
No, you!
It is you!
No, you!
Scrylla!
Yera Retoure!
That was incredible, Diana!
You are a genius witch!
Ladies, would it trouble you not to disturb the lesson with your vulgar feud?
You are being quite the nuisance.
What?!
Hey, who are you calling vulgar?!
Silence!
It appears to me that you are looking for some punishment.
A punishment that will drain the blood from your veins!
Why not use your time sitting in the corner to settle this matter?
The question of which of you is the biggest dunce in school.
Diana's such a pain in the ass.
Just because she is a little good at magic.
Seriously.
I do not give a damn what family she is from.
That snobby attitude just pisses me off!
Take your genius witch and stuff it!
Hey, why am I the only one here taking the cleaning seriously?
Wh-What?
What are those?
Let us get closer!
Get on!
Okay!
Headmistress, it is an emergency!
The Sorcerer's Stone was stolen!
What was that, Kagari-san?
A whole bunch of dragons came and flew away with it!
It seems the oracle was correct.
The dragon's wrath...
Wrath?
What wrath?
Calm down.
We are already aware of the situation.
Let us go get the Sorcerer's Stone back right away!
We will lend you our help too!
Wait... we?
That will not do, and that goes double for you.
We will resolve this issue, so you two return to your rooms.
The Sorcerer's Stone is the source of our magic!
We will not be able to use magic at Luna Nova without it, and it does not look like you care!
That is enough, Akko and Amanda.
I believe we had assigned you to cleaning duty as punishment.
Th-This is not the time
Atsuko Kagari, I am appointing you to handwash all of the academy's laundry.
That goes for you too, Amanda O'Neill!
Now, step to it!
On the double!
Why do we have to do the laundry?!
It cannot be helped.
Without the Sorcerer's Stone, none of the sprites can move.
There is no other option than for us to do the cleaning, laundry, and cooking.
Anyway, why are Lotte and I even helping you with your punishment?
Geez!
Why are we wasting our time doing all this?!
Chill out with the pedaling, you are splashing water all the way over here.
What are you saying we can even do against the dragons?
Even the hags were shaking in their bloomers.
Well, legend says that dragons used to slice witches open and slurp out their blood for magic replenishment.
Then they would eat them, meat and bone.
Gross.
But I doubt there are any witch-eating dragons around these days.
Could that mean that instead of witches, they stole the Sorcerer's Stone to replenish their magic?
Maybe, but who knows.
The first dragon from around here that comes to mind is the one from the Rastaban Ruins.
Lotte, you know it?
Back in the day, it was known as one of the more brutal dragons.
But hardly anyone has seen it in the last hundred years or so.
Curse you for rising from your hundred-year break!
I will not forgive you for stealing our precious Sorcerer's Stone at the exact time we are here in school!
You have left us no choice but to take back the Stone ourselves!
And right on cue, there is another one of Akko's crazy ideas.
Give it up.
Diana.
The only thing you should be concerning yourselves with is the laundry.
Do refrain from taking any futile actions.
What did you come here for?
I have a message from Professor Finneran to relay.
After you have finished the laundry, you are to draw water.
We are not even close to being done with the laundry though.
This affects you too, Diana!
Without the Sorcerer's Stone, there will not be any more classes!
We cannot even use any magic.
That does not make your plan to confront the dragon yourselves any more likely to succeed.
There is no telling what will happen unless we try!
I can tell already.
People like you, who cannot even keep up in class, would only compound the problem if they were to interfere.
Moreover, it is far too often that you act without proper thought.
Would it not benefit us all for you to recognize your habit of troubling everyone involved with you?
If this goes on unchanged, then one day even your friends will grow unwilling to put up with you.
Hey, what do you care?
Leave her alone!
I have not forgotten you.
All you do is fool around.
You lack goals, but please do not use that as an excuse to inconvenience those around you.
What did you say?
I have relayed the message.
Th-Thanks for telling us.
G-Good night.
Akko.
You are not just going to let her lay into us and keep quiet about it, right?
Of course not!
Huh?
Hold on you two, do not tell me you were serious!
There is no stopping Akko once she is like this.
B-But there is still laundry...
Wh-What about the water?
Huh?!
All right!
The dragon hunting squad is ready to rock!
Pardon the intrusion.
C-Can I help you?
Yes.
Due to the sprites' current inability to perform their cleaning, laundry, and cooking duties,
I have assigned students to each.
I have come to report to the headmistress.
She is currently away from campus.
At a time like this?
Y-Yes.
Goodness, how rare.
What?
These characters...
Our magic's starting to fill up!
We must be getting close to the Sorcerer's Stone.
Look, I think that is it!
The Rastaban Ruins.
Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
There is no question, those are the Rastaban Ruins.
What the heck?!
Over there!
They were the ones who stole the Sorcerer's Stone!
We have got incoming!
Listen up!
Let us split into groups!
Over here!
Catch me if you can!
Slonhon Deance!
Got them!
What is this?
What is up?
Akko!
Lotte!
Sucy!
Constanze!
Jasna!
Akko, after them!
Got it!
Akko?
Are you okay?
Ouch...
Is this underneath the ruins?
Looks like we made it in somehow.
Let us look for the others.
Right.
What kind of room is this?
Looks like a kitchen storage room.
You are not going to tell me it actually eats witches, right?
Hide!
Girls!
This is bad.
Get your claws off them!
Wait, you idiot!
A-Are you planning to eat me?
I do not taste good at all!
You will get a stomachache!
Probably, definitely, for sure!
So do not eat me!
Pipe down!
Who in their right mind would eat a witch?
Not to mention one who looks as rancid as you.
H-How rude!
I am deliciou
Got'cha.
I assume you are the ones who got caught by my security system.
Are you saying...
That is just a food processor?
Looks like you are Luna Nova students.
Did you bring the money you owe me?
The money we owe?
Did not Headmistress Holbrooke send it with you?
What are you talking about?
We just came to take back the Sorcerer's Stone.
I apologize for bothering you this late.
H-Headmistress?
There you are.
Come in.
You girls... what in the world are you doing here?
Were these students a ploy to buy you some time, Headmistress?
A-Absolutely not, Lord Fafnir!
So, have you brought my money?
A-About that...
Please accept these instead...
What a heap of junk!
Do not think you can wriggle your way out of this!
What I demand is cold, hard cash!
Would you explain what this whole money thing's about already?
Is it ransom for the Sorcerer's Stone?
Do not make me laugh.
Luna Nova has an enormous amount of debt, and it is owed to yours truly.
But I have not received a single interest payment on it over the last year.
Not one penny!
No matter how many times I call, all I get are excuses.
I warned you that I would take your Sorcerer's Stone the next time you ignore me!
W-We never thought you would make good on your threat...
So basically, the Sorcerer's Stone...
Was repossessed because the school defaulted.
Consider it a warning.
Even selling it would not cover a fraction of the debt you owe.
How the heck much did we borrow?!
Lord Fafnir, we beg your understanding.
Luna Nova is losing more students each year.
We are barely receiving one-tenth the number of applicants as we were during the golden age of magic.
You have only yourselves to blame for pushing magic while it is falling out of favor.
Look at me!
My online investments are netting me immense profits.
Wh-What is this?
I-If you are so well off, then please have mercy!
I do not want to wait another second!
I will repossess Luna Nova and sell it off myself!
Luna Nova has finally reached its end...
Hey, you grumpy old dragon!
O-Old?
Is that giant heart you have just for show?
It is not like you need the money.
Do not be a stickler!
Wh-What was that?
And since you are a dragon and all, what is even the point of making all that money?!
What is wrong with a dragon making money?
Money does not discriminate between humans and dragons.
Luna Nova is reaching the end of its usefulness anyway.
All I want is to collect on it before its value drops to nothing.
No, no, no!
No way in hell!
I have my own ambitions!
I will not let you shut down Luna Nova!
I could not care less about that.
You would better care about what I want!
Stingy!
Who are you calling stingy?
You!
You stingy dragon!
You return what you borrow.
That is how the real world works.
I will be taking everything that you owe me!
We owe you exactly nothing.
Diana!
Look at this.
This is the promissory note you signed with Luna Nova one thousand years ago.
Promissory note?
That was a promissory note?
Yes, but it is written in ancient Dragonese, so nobody could read it.
And you can, Diana?
Yes, I became fluent at the age of twelve.
There is no mention of interest anywhere on this.
Which means there was never a need to pay interest in the first place.
You abused the fact that our teachers could not read ancient Dragonese and pulled the wool over their eyes!
You had them pay nonexistent interest!
A baseless accusation.
There is no such thing as a non-interest-bearing loan these days.
I declare a contract that old invalid!
Then are we to understand that the debt itself is also invalidated?
Th-That is
According to my calculations,
the sum of the payments made by Luna Nova far exceeds the principal sum of the initial debt.
Considering that the interest itself has been invalidated, may we assume the rest of the debt to be cleared?
Regarding the refunding of the overpayments, we will provide you with the proper documentation at a later date.
In light of these arguments, we request the immediate return of our Sorcerer's Stone, Mister Fafnir.
Thank goodness!
We are saved...
I thought that was the end...
The world has no need for dragons or witches in this age of science.
Magic is fated to be forgotten in the near future.
That will not happen!
Even now, magic has the power to move hearts!
It is been quite some time since I have last heard someone spout a line that naive.
Just you watch!
I am going to become an amazing witch one day and make the whole world gasp in surprise!
Hmph!
Is that the dream you were talking about?
That is right!
You will learn soon enough that no man can live off dreams alone.
Later, Gramps!
Try and keep your greed in check.
To think that there were still humans with that look in their eyes.
So in the end, we are back to laundry duty.
What did you expect?
We broke the rules and left campus without permission.
Be grateful this is the end of our punishment.
Yeah, but it still sucks that Diana totally stole the show.
You are telling me.
Just how perfect can one girl be?
She is so perfect I want to hurl.
But that is what makes her worth taking down!
I have no qualms with her as my rival.
Huh?!
You are nowhere near good enough for that.
Remember your place as the school's biggest dunce.
The biggest dunce here is you, Amanda!
It is you, Akko!
Say that again!
Why you!
Please just stop it already, you two!
